post.description: Create a new user account with email and password. Returns authentication tokens.
Authenticate a user with email and password. Returns authentication tokens.
Get a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Request a password reset email. (Not yet implemented)
Reset password using reset token. (Not yet implemented)

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Get all programs for the current user (active, completed, paused).

schema.title: Response List Programs Api V1 Programs Get

post.description: Create a new training program with training maxes, training days, and accessories.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific program.

put.description: Update program name, status, or end date.

delete.description: Delete a program and all associated data (workouts, training maxes, etc.).

post.summary: Complete cycle and increase training maxes
post.description: Finish current cycle and automatically increase training maxes per 5/3/1 methodology.

schema.title: Response Complete Cycle Api V1 Programs  Program Id  Complete Cycle Post

post.description: Create 16 new workouts for the next cycle using updated training maxes.

schema.title: Response Generate Next Cycle Api V1 Programs  Program Id  Generate Next Cycle Post

get.description: Get all available exercises (predefined from book + user's custom exercises).

schema.title: Response List Exercises Api V1 Exercises Get

post.description: Create a new custom exercise for the current user.

get.description: Get workouts for the current user with optional filters.

parameters.name: main_lifts

schema.description: Filter by main lifts (press, deadlift, bench_press, squat)
schema.title: Main Lifts

parameters.description: Filter by main lifts (press, deadlift, bench_press, squat)

schema.title: Response List Workouts Api V1 Workouts Get

get.description: Get all workouts that are past their scheduled date but not completed.
Get detailed workout information including all prescribed sets.

post.description: Log all sets, mark workout as completed, and get performance analysis.
Mark a workout as intentionally skipped.
Skip or reschedule a missed workout.

get.description: Get personal records (rep maxes) for all lifts across all rep ranges (1-12).

get.summary: Get rep maxes for specific lift
get.description: Get personal records for a specific lift across all rep ranges (1-12).
Get all warmup templates for the current user, optionally filtered by lift type.

schema.title: Response List Warmup Templates Api V1 Warmup Templates Get

post.description: Create a new custom warmup template.

get.description: Get a specific warmup template by ID.
Get training max progression over time for all lifts in a program.
Get detailed workout history with performance statistics.

circuit_group.title: Circuit Group
circuit_group.description: Circuit group number (exercises with same number are done as a circuit). None = standalone exercise.

AccessoryExerciseInput.title: AccessoryExerciseInput
AccessoryExerciseInput.description: Schema for an accessory exercise in a program.

lifts.title: Lifts
lifts.description: Rep maxes keyed by lift type (SQUAT, DEADLIFT, BENCH_PRESS, PRESS)

AllRepMaxesResponse.title: AllRepMaxesResponse
AllRepMaxesResponse.description: All rep maxes for all lifts.

CycleFailedRepsAnalysis.title: CycleFailedRepsAnalysis
CycleFailedRepsAnalysis.description: Analysis of failed reps across an entire cycle.

ExerciseCreateRequest.title: ExerciseCreateRequest
ExerciseCreateRequest.description: Schema for creating a custom exercise.

is_predefined.title: Is Predefined
is_predefined.description: Whether this is a predefined exercise from the book

reschedule_date.title: Reschedule Date
reschedule_date.description: Date to reschedule to (required if action is 'reschedule')

HandleMissedWorkoutRequest.title: HandleMissedWorkoutRequest
HandleMissedWorkoutRequest.description: Request to handle a missed workout.

HandleMissedWorkoutResponse.title: HandleMissedWorkoutResponse
HandleMissedWorkoutResponse.description: Response after handling a missed workout.

lift_type.title: Lift Type
lift_type.description: The lift type (squat, deadlift, bench_press, press)

all_targets_met.title: All Targets Met
all_targets_met.description: Whether all working set targets were met

failed_sets.title: Failed Sets
failed_sets.description: List of sets that failed to meet target

amrap_reps.title: Amrap Reps
amrap_reps.description: Reps achieved on AMRAP set (if applicable)

current_training_max.title: Current Training Max
current_training_max.description: Current training max for this lift

estimated_1rm.title: Estimated 1Rm
estimated_1rm.description: Estimated 1RM based on AMRAP performance (Epley formula)

suggested_training_max.title: Suggested Training Max
suggested_training_max.description: Suggested new training max (90% of estimated 1RM)

recommendation_type.title: Recommendation Type
recommendation_type.description: Type of recommendation: info, warning, or critical

LiftAnalysis.title: LiftAnalysis
LiftAnalysis.description: Analysis of performance for a single lift.

include_deload.title: Include Deload
include_deload.description: Include deload week (week 4) in each cycle

accessories.title: Accessories
accessories.description: Accessories per day (keys: '1','2' for 2_day, '1','2','3' for 3_day, or '1','2','3','4' for 4_day)

ProgramCreateRequest.title: ProgramCreateRequest
ProgramCreateRequest.description: Schema for creating a new program.

ProgramDetailResponse.title: ProgramDetailResponse
ProgramDetailResponse.description: Schema for detailed program response with training maxes.

rep_maxes.title: Rep Maxes
rep_maxes.description: Rep maxes keyed by rep count (1-12)

RepMaxByRepsResponse.title: RepMaxByRepsResponse
RepMaxByRepsResponse.description: Rep maxes organized by rep count for a single lift.

lift_type.title: Lift Type
lift_type.description: Lift type for multi-lift workouts (squat, bench, deadlift, press)

SetLogRequest.title: SetLogRequest
SetLogRequest.description: Request to log a single set.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date when this training max became effective (YYYY-MM-DD)

TrainingMaxDataPoint.title: TrainingMaxDataPoint
TrainingMaxDataPoint.description: Single data point in training max progression.

squat.title: Squat
squat.description: Training max for squat (in user's preferred unit)

TrainingMaxInput.title: TrainingMaxInput
TrainingMaxInput.description: Schema for setting training max for a lift.

data.title: Data
data.description: Training max progression data grouped by lift type

TrainingMaxProgressionResponse.title: TrainingMaxProgressionResponse
TrainingMaxProgressionResponse.description: Response for training max progression analytics.

effective_date.title: Effective Date
effective_date.description: Date when this TM became effective

value.title: Value
value.description: Weight value (null for 'bar', fixed weight for 'fixed', percentage for 'percentage')

WarmupSet.title: WarmupSet
WarmupSet.description: Schema for a single warmup set.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Whether this should be the default template for this lift

sets.title: Sets
sets.description: Array of warmup sets (at least one required)

WarmupTemplateCreateRequest.title: WarmupTemplateCreateRequest
WarmupTemplateCreateRequest.description: Schema for creating a warmup template.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Whether this is the default template for this lift

overall_success.title: Overall Success
overall_success.description: Whether all lifts met their targets

lifts.title: Lifts
lifts.description: Analysis for each lift in the workout

cycle_analysis.description: Cycle-level analysis if there are failures across the cycle

completed_date.title: Completed Date
completed_date.description: When workout was completed (defaults to now)

WorkoutCompleteRequest.title: WorkoutCompleteRequest
WorkoutCompleteRequest.description: Request to complete a workout with all logged sets.

WorkoutCompletionResponse.title: WorkoutCompletionResponse
WorkoutCompletionResponse.description: Response for workout completion including analysis.

WorkoutDetailResponse.title: WorkoutDetailResponse
WorkoutDetailResponse.description: Detailed workout with prescribed sets organized by lift.

total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of workouts matching criteria

WorkoutKeyStats.title: WorkoutKeyStats
WorkoutKeyStats.description: Key statistics from a workout (AMRAP performance).

WorkoutMainLiftResponse.title: WorkoutMainLiftResponse
WorkoutMainLiftResponse.description: Response model for a main lift in a workout.

WorkoutSetResponse.title: WorkoutSetResponse
WorkoutSetResponse.description: Response model for a workout set (prescribed or logged).

WorkoutSetsForLift.title: WorkoutSetsForLift
WorkoutSetsForLift.description: Sets organized by type for a specific lift.
